space.arim.perms.api

Interface ArimPermsApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    space.arim.universal.util.AutoClosable, AutoCloseable, Configurable, PermissionsPlugin, space.arim.universal.registry.Registrable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArimPerms
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArimPermsPlugin

    public interface ArimPermsApi
extends PermissionsPlugin, Configurable
    A more specific subclass of PermissionsPlugin intended to implement the ArimPerms API.
    Author:
    A248

      • hasPermission

        default boolean hasPermission(UUID player,
                              String permission,
                              @Nullable String section)
        Description copied from interface: PermissionsPlugin
        Checks whether a player has a specific permission with optional permissions category.
        On Spigot servers, the categories are usually the worlds. On BungeeCord proxies, the categories are usually the subservers.
        Specified by:
        hasPermission in interface PermissionsPlugin
        Parameters:
        player - the player UUID
        permission - the permission
        section - the permissions category, if null, the main category
        Returns:
        true if the user has the permission, false otherwise

        Returns:

        UserManager users()
        Allows for handling users
        Returns:
        the UserManager
